description:
Add "My Playlists" Button to Mobile Dashboard

Implement a "My Playlists" button or navigation element on the dashboard that is visible and accessible on mobile devices.

Requirements:
- Add a clearly visible "My Playlists" button/link to the mobile dashboard view
- Ensure the button is properly styled and sized for mobile touch targets (minimum 44x44px)
- Verify the button navigates to the correct playlists page/section
- Check that the button appears in a logical location within the mobile dashboard layout
- Test on various mobile screen sizes (small phones, large phones, tablets)
- Ensure the button does not already exist but is hidden due to CSS/styling issues
- Verify the desktop version is not affected by mobile-specific changes

Investigation needed:
- Determine if this is a missing feature or a display/rendering bug
- Check if the button exists in the DOM but is not visible (CSS issue)
- Verify responsive breakpoints are working correctly
- Review if there are differences between iOS and Android rendering
title: Add My Playlists button to mobile dashboard
